q1: How does Liverpool's team compare to Machester?
a1: That's a contentious question! Supporters of each would fervently claim that their own team is far the superior.
q2: Who has won more Champions League titles: Liverpool or Manchester United?
a2: Manchester United has won the trophy twices (98/99 & 07/08) where Liverpool has ony won it once (04/05).
q3: I still like Liverpool better because of their team spirit.
a3: Yes, I would agree to that.
q4: if Manchester United has won more trophies but I think Liverpool has more winning spirit
a4: Salah is a great player of liverpool
a5: Mane and Firminho are also their best player last season
